generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A paved path alongside the road, separated by a curb and grass, is visible on the right side, suitable for pedestrians.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road, particularly on the right side.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky with patches of blue visible through the clouds.
- person: A person wearing an orange shirt and dark shorts is visible on the right sidewalk, walking.
- car: A red car is visible in the distance on the left side of the road, and a silver car is visible further ahead in the center of the road.
- pole: Several tall, vertical poles are visible along the road, including one near the sidewalk on the right.
- traffic sign: A rectangular sign with text and graphics is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- fence: A chain-link fence is visible on the left side of the road, running parallel to it.
